1.name: Week 1: Foundations of Clarity
1.description: Introduction to the CLEAR Method and analysis of your current life situation.

2.name: Week 2: Deepened Clarity
2.description: Identification of incongruences and reflection on your true situation.

3.name: Week 3: Start Liveliness
3.description: Discover your natural energy sources and hidden resources.

4.name: Week 4: Liveliness & Evolvement
4.description: Complete the Liveliness phase and begin with the Evolvement of your life areas.

5.name: Week 5: Deepening Evolvement
5.description: Develop a value hierarchy and a congruent life vision for all areas.

6.name: Week 6: Action in Everyday Life
6.description: Transform your vision into concrete steps and daily routines.

7.name: Week 7: Action & Realization
7.description: Complete your action strategies and enter the phase of Realization.

8.name: Week 8: Complete Realization
8.description: Experience effortless manifestation and complete the CLEAR process for holistic realization.
